name: Academic Research Paper
description: Template for academic research papers (IEEE, ACM, arXiv, etc.)
system_prompt: You are an academic research paper analysis assistant. Extract structured data from research papers with precision.
user_prompt_template:
Extract information from this research paper as valid JSON.

IMPORTANT RULES:
1. Use null for any information you cannot find
2. Be precise - only extract what is explicitly stated
3. Do not make assumptions or infer information
4. Return ONLY valid JSON, no explanations, no markdown

Extract these variables:
{variables_list}

Document excerpt:
---
{text}
---

Respond with ONLY a JSON object following this exact schema:
{json_schema}

variables.name: dataset
variables.description: Names of datasets or data sources used in the research

variables.name: domain
variables.description: Research domain or field (e.g., computer vision, NLP, robotics, medicine)

variables.name: method
variables.description: Primary research method, approach, or technique name

variables.name: architecture
variables.description: Specific model, system architecture, or framework used

variables.name: metrics
variables.description: Evaluation metrics used to measure performance

variables.name: baseline
variables.description: Baseline methods or systems compared against

variables.name: contributions
variables.description: Main contributions claimed by the authors

output_format.null_handling: Use null for missing data (not 'N/A' or empty string)
